Temp Storage - Boss Life
When boss is invulnerable, life value is store here. May only be with Oil Area boss.

Charge Amount [8-bit]
If player holds the attack button, player action (0xc0c0) is set to "charging" (0x0f) and charge amount is reset to 0x00 and counts up to 0x08. Then if the player releases the attack button while charge amount equals 0x08 the player action is set to "fire charge" (0x10) and a projectile is fired. The value will remain at 0x08 until another charge action is triggered.
0x08 = Fully Charged

Charge Shot State [8-bit]
This is the state of the on-screen fireball that's fired when executing a charged shot
0x00 = Destroyed/Not Active
0x01 = On Screen

Charge Shot Sub State [8-bit]
This is the sub state of the on-screen fireball that's fired when executing a charged shot. Sub state is set to 0x01 for exactly one frame after colliding with an enemy/boss.
0x00 = Miss
0x01 = Hit Enemy/Boss
